I write poems about my life and my culture.
my favorite show is csi.

participant_2.background:
I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories.
i work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager.
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
i have a garden.
I collect movie posters from my favorite films.

content.text: Hello there, I'm new here and looking to make some friends.
Hi there, nice to meet you! What are you interested in?
I'm into many things, but I'd say my main interests are poetry, powerlifting, and travel.

Poetry, powerlifting, and travel? Those are all great interests! I've never been much of a poet myself, but I do enjoy travel and powerlifting. I've been to many countries, and I've been lifting weights for about 10 years.
That's awesome! I've only been powerlifting for a few years, but I'm really enjoying it. I've been to a few countries, but I'd love to travel more.
Yeah, powerlifting is a great way to stay in shape and get stronger. I'm glad you're enjoying it. And travel is definitely a great way to see the world and learn about different cultures.
I agree! I'm really looking forward to traveling more in the future.
Me too! What are some of the places you'd like to visit?
I'd love to go to Japan, China, and India. I'm also interested in visiting some of the countries in South America.

Those are all great places to visit! I've been to Japan and China, and they're both amazing countries. India is definitely on my list of places to visit. And I've never been to South America, but I've heard great things about it.
I've heard great things about all of those places too. I'm sure they'd all be amazing to visit.
Yeah, they definitely would. I hope you're able to visit them all someday.
